briefDescription: Gets the shader_field_info_handles of the primitive shader types making up a given type, each representing a shader_field_info*.

overloads.declaration: template <ShaderField Type, typename Container> static auto shader_field_info_handles() -> const Container&;
overloads.description:
Returns the shader_field_info_handles of the primitive shader types making up the given type. Each handle represents a shader_field_info*.
This function specifically returns a reference to a statically constructed object of the given "Container" type; the object is constructed with a begin- and end-iterator.

detailedDescription: This reveals a lower level of abstractions, and so should rarely be used.
